subject: AI & Agents
title: Layers: Building Depth
description: A short lesson to help you apply Layers: Building Depth.

hook.text: Layer 1 detects edges. Layer 2 detects shapes. Layer 3 detects objects. Depth creates abstraction.

buildup.text: Neural networks stack layers. Each layer transforms its input into a more abstract representation.

discovery.text: Early layers learn simple features. Deeper layers combine them into complex concepts.

twist.text: Too few layers and the network can't learn. Too many and it becomes hard to train.

climax.text: GPT-4 has over 100 layers. Each one refines the representation of your text.

punchline.text: Intelligence is abstraction, and abstraction needs depth.

quiz.question: What happens as you go deeper in a neural network?
options: Features become more abstract and complex
